extendedInfo.description: FREE Calls to U.S. and Canadian phone numbers â or to any magicJack number, anywhere in the world. magicJack APP will NEVER use your mobile minutes and does not require a voice plan. WiFi or 4G recommended. magicJack APP is 100% FREE and does not require any purchase. You can use your Android device's stored contacts with the magicJack APP. Download magicJack APP today and start making FREE calls instantly. IMPORTANT: NEW USERS If you do not have a magicJack account, you have two options with magicJack APP: 1. Test drive it! No account needed. Make outgoing calls to U.S. and Canadian landlines and cell numbers and any magicJack number. ORâ¦ 2. Receive a free magicNumber phone number to make and receive FREE calls and receive FREE Voicemail. A magicNumber starts and ends with an asterisk/star, like so: *0123456777* and can be dialed directly from any magicJack. You can use this number for magicJack to magicJack calls or have others call you from anywhere, like so: â¢ First dialing the access number: 1-305-848-TALK (1-305-848-8255). â¢ After the prompt, enter the magicNumber including the asterisks/stars, like so: *01234567* In magicJack APP, click the Account tab at any time to view your magicNumber. Tell friends to download magicJack APP and dial each other direct for free. EXISTING CUSTOMERS If you sign in to magicJack APP with an active U.S. or Canadian phone number on your magicJack account, you may use it to make and receive calls with magicJack APP. You can use the same number on all your magicJack services and devices.

reviews.title: I have been waiting.
reviews.comment: CLOSE APP OPTION ADDED!!! LOVE IT. FOR THOSE HAVING ISSUES WITH (this device not registered with account) back all your apps and info then do a factory reset. Did this myself and all good now!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great for free
reviews.comment: They have fixed the 4.3 issue and now works great again.
reviews.author: Fuh Que II

reviews.title: Google Nexus 7 user
reviews.comment: Works very well and quite useful when my tablet is in my hand and I don\'t want to scramble for a phone. Ties into your contacts list for easy access to phone numbers. (UPDATE) It now works on android 4.3 Nexus 7 tablets!
reviews.author: Randolph Mitchell

reviews.title: Great!!!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this on my tablet for about a month now and I find it to be fantastic. I bought a hotspot for it and my netbook anyway, so I paid the $20 for this and use it exclusively. I intend to replace my phone with it next month and just use the tablet and this for everything. It works for free, but the paid version gives me a number I can give to others. UPDATE: Months later and still using it. Even moved it to another tablet and had it working flawlessly on both for a couple of months.
reviews.author: Al B

reviews.title: Thanks for the upgrade!
reviews.comment: It is now working with android 4.3!
reviews.author: Kenneth Myers

reviews.title: Keysha
reviews.comment: I really like this app,  but could you please make a exit option,so the app won\'t be running all the time. Other then that great app.
reviews.author: Carrie Pennington

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: I use a Samsung s3 and this programme has hung up and frozen my phone everytime I used it. I will be uninstalling it.
reviews.author: Kitana Kitty

reviews.title: Error
reviews.comment: It downloaded. I made my account. With the first choice plan. On my account it says error no audio. It does not have a dial tone when i try to put in my magicjack account number. Help please!?
reviews.author: Desiree W

reviews.title: Cannot find exit option
reviews.comment: I cant find the exit option.  The on screen button that i would normally push for settings (3 dots) does nothing.  I do not like to have to go into phone settings and force close every time  Other than that I like app
reviews.author: clint stuckless

reviews.title: Finally Closes Under Settings Option
reviews.comment: 5 STARS.... Because this is linked to my home Magic Jack.... \"THE BEST\".... I Have Magic Jack in my house and the app on my cell phone..Both the same number so when I get a call at home, my cell phone rings!!!!!! A+++++:-)
reviews.author: James Cacioppo

reviews.title: :P
reviews.comment: When I\'m using Aviary Photo Editor MagicJack Jumps in and resets what I\'ve done and it\'s really getting annoying......
reviews.author: Matthew Peterson

reviews.title: Great app stupendous app amazing app
reviews.comment: Best app i have ever had in my life calls are totally free no credit card
reviews.author: Marquis Thomas

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Works darn good in a new phone that doesn\'t even have a sim card or phone with nobody\'s service. Totally new phone...
reviews.author: J Williams

reviews.title: Best calling app out there
reviews.comment: Downloaded it the first time and its been working like a champ. Love that you can make and receive calls for free thats right free. All I had to do was just call someone and they are able to call me right back. Now you dont have to worry about those ignoring people call you. Because as long you dont dial there number they wont be able to call you and that\'s a plus plus. Love it
reviews.author: Jessie Moore

reviews.title: Fix close app feature to always work...
reviews.comment: Works good so far love the new close app feature but it doesn\'t always work....I have to un install it sometimes and then reinstall it to close it....fix that issue and I will give it five stars. ....
reviews.author: Grumpy Hill

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Cool app but not so happy about the screen display why no landscape? I have too bind my phone to on direction in order too use this app pls fix all this then I will rate it a 5star. Andriod 4.0 ice cream
reviews.author: Eric Phillips

reviews.title: UPDATED YAY!
reviews.comment: I just noticed that the app was updated. Installed and it is working great just like it did before the 4.3 patch :). 5 stars again.
reviews.author: Arthur Franco

reviews.title: Works good as free phone but...
reviews.comment: After I installed it my Google Voice Search app won\'t work. Uninstalling Magic Jack restores Google Voice Search. What\'s up with that?
reviews.author: Marc St-Pierre

reviews.title: Not working on android 4.3
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t get open after I updated to android 4.3 . also tried installing the app again. Same issue exist. Please rectify  Update : Updated the new version of the app... now it work for android 4.3, but as I saw in some  reviews, new  version has capability to close the app, i wasn\'t able to find that. (someone mentioned : need to backup all apps and contact and do a factory reset), I am definately not doing a factory reset for this.  Please advise.
reviews.author: Aditya Singhal

reviews.comment: Haven\'t had any problems with it at all i think its a pretty bad a** app really
reviews.author: Cory Zeigler
